@lolhentai101 Gotcha. Thanks man, it's much appreciated.  I really like how proactive and up-front she'd been about who she is and what she wanted. I can totally understand her motivations & methods (Angry at FMC for upstaging her & being hotter, wants revenge against her and to gain status as head bitch). Such a forward & ruthless but very relatable character is rare in JP media so I'm glad she emerged triumphant in this story.

@reyas It seems like she was made president of the tennis team, by a recommendation (I assume from one of the teachers). She then thinks how its good because not only did she drag Kaori down, she returned to the club, it feels like she is taking everything that was Kaori's to her pleasure. She continues to remember what the pigtail said that her first act as president was to deal with Kaori, and try to get her back for a practice match with another school. She then calls Kaori an asswipe says that she needs to deal with her nasty (I think loose) former ace. She then gets a call from the soccer camp that shows she sent them something, and says they don't have to give it back, including Kaori. At this point it seems like the Evil Bitch wants nothing to do with Kaori, so I don't know if she'll have much of a role in part 5 either.
It is also possible to translate from Japanese to Chinese and English. Please stop! Do you have the author's permission? If you want to read it, learn Japanese and buy it legit!
Don't read only illegally and for free. Buy it legit! The author wrote this book so that you foreigners can read it for free. I bought it.

@lolhentai101 Thanks for the breakdown. Kaori is a cunt and CF should leave her. Yeah she has an amazing body but she belongs to the streets, more so than usual even for NTR manga. Anything you could tell us about Evil Bitch? she barely shows up in this part but she's my fav character.

The part 5 teaser says something like forced bf change which I guess the (CF) has to break up with Kaori and Kaori has to date the captain. 

but so overall bad for the (CF) in so many areas like he slowly went from a good boyfriend in part 1 to now part 4 where he bet and lost Kaori. I'm curious how this continues and how long Cyclone plans to make it.

The childhood friend (CF) accepts out of anger. Later while having sex with her (CF) , Kaori remembers what the captain said about her (Kaori) feeling guilty and trying to break up with her (CH). (this part was confusing so I tried to piece it out) But it seems like the captain thinks this is easier on Kaori for her to break up with her (CH) this way instead. The (CF) surprises Kaori and finally makes her cum. Kaori wants more but doesn't want to ruin his studying. She thinks she is getting back to her normal self but if she closes her eyes, she still gets horny. Then its found that the captain ranked 3 spaces higher than the (CF).

Kaori continues to be used as a sex toy by the soccer team. One of the soccer captains at the end of part 4 wanted her to date him instead of her childhood friend. The team has a system where if the girl has a bf they won't do it inside her. The captain keeps trying to change her mind, even suggesting her to pretend which she doesn't deny. One of the other managers  toy and uniform she used in part 2 to try and bring Kaori further down. Kaori wears the uniform and remembers the pleasure her kohai forced her to have in part 2, and gets more turned on.  It seems like Kaori decides to break up with her childhood friend out of guilt. But the captain tells her childhood friend that he likes her and challenges him to a competition to see who gets the higher score in their next test.
